text:
Whatâ€™s the best practice using resize function ?

1. Should I resize image depends on media queries?
 2.  Should I use one size from desktop ?

Hey Tom, we have recommendations here:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/speed#what-you-can-do>

For img elements you can also create custom srcsets using resize_image_url

basic summary is 1. yes if your img is being used in CSS and is large.
2. using a srcset is the best option but still using resize_image_url and width and height attributes is going to be more performant than not doing it at all.
